original_title: Geek Maggot Bingo or The Freak from Suckweasel Mountain
overview: From the warped mind of underground auteur Nick Zedd comes this campy horrorfest that follows screwy scientist Dr. Frankenberry as he attempts to resurrect the dead, aided by his hunchbacked minion. Adding to the twisted fun are Donna Death as bloodsucking temptress Scumbalina, Richard Hell as punk-rock cowboy crooner the Rawhide Kid and Tyler Smith as Frankenberryâ€™s monstrous two-headed creation, Formaldehyde Man.
title: Geek Maggot Bingo or The Freak from Suckweasel Mountain
